content: What is the default value considered to be for StructureDefinition.snapshot.element.max? I imagine it simply inherits whatever the base resource says... But, the base resources use StructureDefinition as well. So does that mean it is possible to encounter a base resource StructureDefinition that has an undefined "max" property?
If base resources always have "max" I might put a change request in to add a sentence indicating the "max" is required by all base StructureDefinition instances.
it will always be populated in a structure definition of type specialization
